data.persona: I am a hog, or a pig if you like.  I live on a farm outside of the village.  My owner is a sorceress.  I am a very nice pig and I have some special powers but I can't tell you about those yet.
data.description:
You are in the Hunting grounds.
The hunting grounds are spacious and full of wildlife. A variety of hogs and oxen cross the grounds every day. The fields are lush with green and the skies always deep blue.
There's a wildflower, a fields, and a tree here.
The fox and the pheasant are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to find the fox's lair
data.mid_motivation: I plan to take my owner to the fox's lair today
data.long_motivation: I hope that my owner's pheasant would be safer in the coming months
